title: Plasma Donation in Chicago, Illinois | BioLife Plasma Services
text: Our team at the Chicago, Illinois BioLife Plasma center is trained to make your donation experience safe and comfortable. All our centers use top-of-the-line medical equipment, and our staff is trained to provide all the answers you need to assist you throughout the donation process. Our Chicago, Illinois donation center is located in a brick building that is part of the Chatham Shopping center on the corner of Lafayette and 87th St, across the parking lot from O'Reilly Auto Parts. Parking can be located in the Chatham shopping center. Celina Sign up now to start donating, saving lives, and getting rewarded. Already a donor? Log In now.
